Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
If a published resource does not match any rule, still all VFS resources that match the <resourcetorender> node's regular expressions from the global render settings will be exported.

Keep also in mind that if you specify an <export-resources> URI that does not match the <resourcetorender> node's regular expressions, it will not be exported. So keep your <resourcetorender> node's regular expressions synchronized with your  <export-resources> URIs.

Please note also, that if a resource is exported having a link to another resource, the last one will only be exported if it is part of the<export-resources> set.
